casebody.data:
No. 8,

Orig.

Arizona v. California et al.

Joint motion for additional time for oral argument and for divided argument granted, and a total of one and one-half hours allotted for oral argument and no more than two counsel per side shall present oral argument.

Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.

[For earlier order herein, see, e. g., ante, p. 811.]
